original_text: I have seen people without enough clothes to keep them warm, or without a coat to wear. I have seen people without enough clothes to keep them warm,
korean_text: 만일 내가 사람이 의복이 없이 죽어가는 것이나 가난한 자가 덮을 것이 없는 것을 못본 체 했다면

sentences.original_text: I have seen people without enough clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 옷이 충분하지 않은 사람들을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: or without a coat to wear
I have seen people without enough clothes
